long_description: Zip on the NRS Clearwater Mesh Back PFD, launch your boat and lean back to take it all in. Flotation is concentrated in the front panels and up high on the back of the PFD, promoting a natural sitting position. Rear mesh paneling makes it easy to sit back in a kayak or canoe seat and enhances ventilation. Large arm openings make it easy to paddle; reflective highlights increase visibility in low light. 2 points of adjustment on shoulders and 6 on torso offer a personalized fit. 2 large front pockets offer easy storage; left pocket includes a lanyard for your keys. The NRS Clearwater Mesh Back PFD features reflective tape to boost your visibility in dim light.
short_description: Zip on the NRS Clearwater Mesh Back PFD, launch your boat and lean back to take it all in.
